param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: POST
method.doc: Policy creation is now supported using both the Policy Editor on the appliance local management interface (LMI) and this JSON specific API by defining the policy as a JSON object.

param.name: Authorization: Basic
param.doc: Basic authentication header.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: dialect
param.doc: The XACML specification used within the policy. Only valid value is XACML Version 2, "urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:2.0:policy:schema:os".

param.name: description
param.doc: A description of the policy. If omitted, the description is set to "".

param.name: attributesRequired
param.doc: True if the values for any attributes specified in the policy must be present in the incoming request. False if the attribute values may optionally be present.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the policy.

param.name: policy
param.doc: The configured XACML 2.0 policy represented as a JSON object.

param.name: predefined
param.doc: False to indicate the policy is custom defined.

param.name: PolicyTag
param.doc: The policy tag for this policy. Value is always: "urn:ibm:security:isam:8.0:xacml:2.0:config-policy".

param.name: PolicyName
param.doc: The policy name.

param.name: PolicySet
param.doc: The JSON object which represents the PolicySet within the XACML representation of the policy.

param.name: Target
param.doc: The policy target object, corresponds to the Target element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Policy
param.doc: An array of policy objects, each corresponding to a Policy element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Description
param.doc: The policy description.

param.name: PolicyCombiningAlgId
param.doc: The policy combining algorithm identifier. Possible values are: "urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:policy-combining-algorithm:deny-overrides", "urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:policy-combining-algorithm:permit-overrides", or "urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:policy-combining-algorithm:first-applicable".

param.name: Subjects
param.doc: The target subjects, corresponds to the Subjects element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: PolicyId
param.doc: The identifier for this policy.

param.name: Rule
param.doc: The rule associated with this policy, corresponds to the Rule element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: RuleCombiningAlgId
param.doc: The rule combining algorithm to be used when assessing the rule of this policy. Value is always: "urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:rule-combining-algorithm:first-applicable".

param.name: Obligations
param.doc: The obligations associated with this policy, corresponds to the Obligations element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Subject
param.doc: An array of each subject applicable to this policy target, corresponds to the Subject elements in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: RuleId
param.doc: The identifier for this rule.

param.name: Condition
param.doc: The condition to be used when evaluating the rule, corresponds to the Condition element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Effect
param.doc: The effect to take place upon rule evaluation. Possible values are: "Permit" or "Deny".

param.name: Obligation
param.doc: An obligation object, corresponds to the Obligation element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: SubjectMatch
param.doc: The subject match object for this target subject, corresponds to the SubjectMatch element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Apply
param.doc: The apply object to be used for evaluating this condition, corresponds to the Apply element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: ObligationId
param.doc: The identifier for this obligation.

param.name: FulfillOn
param.doc: The condition to be met before executing the referenced obligation. Possible values are: "Permit" or "Deny".

param.name: MatchId
param.doc: The match function identifier for this subject match.

param.name: AttributeValue
param.doc: The attribute value object, corresponds to the AttributeValue element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: SubjectAttributeDesignator
param.doc: An array of attribute designator objects for this subject match, corresponds to the SubjectAttributeDesignator element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: FunctionId
param.doc: The identifier for this apply function.

param.name: Function
param.doc: The function to be applied when evaluating this apply function.

param.name: EnvironmentAttributeDesignator
param.doc: An array of environmental attribute designators to be used in this apply function, corresponds to the EnvironmentAttributeDesignator element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: ActionAttributeDesignator
param.doc: An array of action attribute designators to be used in this apply function, corresponds to the ActionAttributeDesignator element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: ResourceAttributeDesignator
param.doc: An array of resource attribute designators to be used in this apply function, corresponds to the ResourceAttributeDesignator element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: SubjectAttributeDesignator
param.doc: An array of subject attribute designators to be used in this apply function, corresponds to the SubjectAttributeDesignator element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: AttributeValue
param.doc: The attribute value object, corresponds to the AttributeValue element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: Apply
param.doc: An array of nested apply function objects to used when evaluating this apply function, corresponds to the Apply element in the resulting XACML 2.0 document.

param.name: DataType
param.doc: The data type of the attribute value.

param.name: content
param.doc: The value of the attribute value object.

param.name: MustBePresent
param.doc: A boolean to indicate whether the attribute described within this designator must be available and present.

param.name: DataType
param.doc: The data type of the attribute retrieved by this designator.

param.name: Issuer
param.doc: The issuer of the attribute retrieved by this designator.

param.name: AttributeId
param.doc: The identifier of the attribute retrieved by this designator.

param.name: FunctionId
param.doc: The identifier of this function.
